text: Mario Ignacio Osbén Méndez (14 July 1950 – 7 February 2021) was a Chilean footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He played for Ñublense, Club de Deportes Concepción, Unión Española, Colo Colo and Cobreloa during his professional career. He represented the Chile national team at the 1982 FIFA World Cup. He played for the team from 1979 to 1988. Osbén died on 7 February 2021 from a heart attack in Concepción, Chile at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chilean footballers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Mario Osbén
